monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Anti Curse
skills.description: Aura: All Debuffs are 20% less effective on Monsters in your party.

skills.name: Apprentice
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Apprentice Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Apprentice Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sidekick & Spellshield (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Arcane Barrage
skills.description: 10 x 65% (650%) magical damage (neutral) Shield self for 1 x (750 + 200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Aurora's Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (300 + 25% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Chilling Wind
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Congeal
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill (Debuff) deals damage to enemies at the start of their turn based on their missing Mana.

skills.name: Cooling
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Chill.

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Deep Freeze
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Deep Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Defensive Presence
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, a random Monster in the party gains Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Freeze
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Ice Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Magic) Applies Chill (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Ice Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Magic) Applies Chill (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

skills.name: Ice Storm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Icy Skin
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Chill on the attacker.

skills.name: Initial Chill
skills.description: Apply Chill (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Light Instinct
skills.description: Decrease damage taken by 15%.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Magic value.

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Multi Chill
skills.description: Aura: Chill (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Reckless Mending
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an ally applies Armor Break or Chill, it regains 3% of Max Health and Max Mana.

skills.name: Restoring Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (50 + 15% Defense) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (60 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (75 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (100 + 15% Defense) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield target for 7 x (125 + 15% Defense) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Severe Cold
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Congeal damage, 65% chance to inflict a Wound stack on them.

skills.name: Severe Infection
skills.description: Aura: Debuffs are 10% more effective against Wounded enemies.

skills.name: Shadow Proc
skills.description: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Sheltered
skills.description: While under the effect of a Shield, reduce all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Shield Aura
skills.description: Aura: All Shield effects of Monsters in the party are increased by 10%.

skills.name: Sidekick
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Sub Zero
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill causes enemies affected by it to take 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Weakness.
